Articles.Content:
Inspired by the Space Race history and "For All Mankind". I would request a Space Race Mode. Say there is another country on Kerbin that we are trying to out develop and explore space even further.

We have to outperform them on science and funds. License out science materials for passive income. Can missile systems be installed with auto targeting. The other country could even try to destroy out sattelites and we have to defend ours too. Maybe Solar storm events. And parts that include radiation shielding.
There won't be weapons in the game, I think they already have too much work to do.

While any actual weaponry is out of the question, I do like the idea of a "rival" space program. I even thought of an idea of how to add one to KSP1. Since the game already has code in it to place craft out in space for contracts, I don't think it would be too hard to spawn a ship here or there to simulate a second space program doing space ventures.

I like the idea of rival space programs, not enemies by any means, but a healthy competition to who is the first on something.

With competition, comes the need for inovation!
